title: Open Beta Missing Download button
body: Just this. I cant find open beta download button under the video on launch client

replies.body: Hmm.. Can you [send me a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) of what you're seeing? I'd be interested in taking a look.

Weird. It's possible that your game files are corrupted, causing this issue. I recommend running a repair using [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5).

Let me know if this caused a change.
i have already tried twice and there's nothing being repaired

I'm sorry to hear that, it's very likely that your game files are *really borked* so I'd recommend completing a full clean reinstallation of League by following [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

I hope this worked for you, please let me know!
